section.title: Basic Trouble Shooting
section.para: This section provides the application installation basic trouble shooting information. Below are the various scenarios experienced in the past and resolved.

section.title: First Time Login Screen Building Issue
section.para: Problem : After application installed successfully and launched the application, login screen not properly building. Below is the sample snapshot which demonstrates how the screen looks like in this scenario

orderedlist.listitem:
Verify Java Script execution mode in portal.properties .
dojo.mode = DEBUG_ALL/DEBUG

dojo.mode key value should be PROD in production environment.
Only in the development environments or for enabling debugging it should be DEBUG/DEBUG_ALL.
Correct the dojo.mode key value to PROD then restart the server. Again try to login then screen should looks as expected.

section.title: Password Encoding Related Issue
section.para: Problem : System doesn't allow to login even with correct password.

para.para:
In case Unix/Linux environment you need to enable default.pwd.string.charset=UTF-8 property. In Windows, by default its UTF-8
#This property if enabled, would identify the file encoding used during password generation.Default charset is UTF-8. #If disabled, password generation would be as per the default fileset.encoding supported by the environment #default.pwd.string.charset=UTF-8

section.title: Online Help Related Issue
section.para: Problem : Online Help is not working. An error message gets displayed on load of the Online Help popup window

para.para: Online Help Content needs to be inserted in Database. Finastra provides target.zip file under Online_help in deliverable. Extract from zip file and update the DB connection properties in "common.properties" with relevant values and execute the batch script "insert_mtp_help.bat" in it. This will insert the Online Help content in Database

listitem.para: Problem : Rate updated in Back office is not reflecting in .

para.para: Ensure below properties are enabled as follows, daemon.entry=raterefresherdaemon daemon.raterefresherdaemon.classname=com.misys.portal.core.daemon.impl.RateRefresherDaemon daemon.raterefresherdaemon.interval=10</varname><varname>daemon.raterefresherdaemon.onstartup=true

listitem.para: Problem : Log files are not generated for Turbine/Torque/Scheduler/Audit under appdata/logs folder.

para.para: Check the following log file paths configured in appdata\config\log4j.properties file for properties log4j.appender.turbine.file, log4j.appender.torque.file, log4j.appender.scheduler.file, log4j.appender.gtpaudit.file.

listitem.para: Problem : Log files are not generated for Turbine/Torque/Scheduler/Audit on Websphere server.

para.para:
change the setup related to class loader policy as specified below. Applications -> Application Types -> Websphere enterprise applications -> Under Select Application -> Under Manage Modules section -> select Module -> Select the Class loader order dropdown value as - Classes loaded with local class loader first (Parent last) -> Click Apply and then ok.
Applications -> Application Types -> Websphere enterprise applications -> Select Application -> Under Detail Properties section-> Click on - Class loading and update detection -> Under Class loader order radio button group -> Select Classes loaded with local class loader first (parent last) radio button -> Click Apply and then Ok button and then restart the Application.

section.title: Application Server and Database Related Issue

listitem.para: Problem : Messages are not getting triggered/consumed for IBM MQ

para.para: For the IBM Websphere, remove the JMS1.1.jar from the mp.ear-->mp.war-->WEB-INF/lib folder before deploying the mp.ear to the websphere in case if any connection to the IBM MQ is to be supported.

listitem.para: Problem : Screen breakages are reported after running DDL statements in DB2

para.para: After running the DDL scripts for the effected tables re-org statements are to be run and the application is to be restarted. This should be done based on the reorgchk status. Example statement will be, REORG TABLEÂ GTP_AUDIT_ITEM
